actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1
actionCalls.label: Service alert for case status change

value.stringValue: Case Status Updated to Response Received
A case you own has been updated to the "Response Received" status. Please check your open cases and work to resolve ASAP.
Closed case has received a response.
A closed case you own has received a response from the customer. Please review the response and reply. Create a new case if necessary.

rules.name: myRule_11
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3) and (4 or (5 and 7) or (6 and 8) or (9 and 8) )
rules.label: Contractor/Old Closed Case

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3 and (4 or 10)) and ((5 and 7) or (6 and 8) or (9 and 8))
rules.label: Case closed 14-30 days active

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3 and 4) and ((5 and 7) or (6 and 8) or 9)
rules.label: Case closed 14-30 days inactive

Flow.description: 2.13.2020 This will update the status based on incoming emails as well as either reopen or create new cases after a certain amount of time being closed. Affects all customer types.
Flow.label: zzz Retired: Case Update to Response Received

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A2
recordUpdates.label: Update Case Status to Response Received

recordUpdates.name: myRule_7_A1
recordUpdates.label: Status is response received and owner changed to CCS

recordUpdates.name: myRule_7_A2
recordUpdates.label: Status is response received and owner changed to Client Group 5
